post.author: Admin
post.title: Raffle Fundraiser Wine Pull
post.description: This year's basket raffle will have a wine pull and we need donations! Sign up here to donate a bott
post.content:
This year's basket raffle will have a wine pull and we need donations! Sign up here to donate a bottle of wine or champagne of your choice.

To participate in the wine pull the day of the event you will need to purchase a ticket and then pick a random bottle of wine! All wine bottles will be wrapped (wrapped to hide the bottle and value) from a selection of expensive, medium range, and cheap wines.

You can drop your donation off on my porch at 12740 Pinebrook Dr or I can come pick them up.

Anne Christensen
330-304-2499
iannehdg@gmail.com
